00013 #ifndef _CLThreadLock

00018 //Set the Logger Output device to the given Diskfile with html formating
00019 #define _CLDiskFileHtml(fileName) \
00020     com::afrigis::util::logsystem::ChronicleLogger::getLogger ().setDevice ( \
00021     new com::afrigis::util::logsystem::DiskFile(fileName));\
00022     com::afrigis::util::logsystem::ChronicleLogger::getLogger().setLogFormatter( \
00023     new com::afrigis::util::logsystem::Html())
00024 
00025 //Set the Logger Output device to the given Diskfile with plain text formating
00026 #define _CLDiskFilePlain(fileName) \
00027     com::afrigis::util::logsystem::ChronicleLogger::getLogger ().setDevice ( \
00028     new com::afrigis::util::logsystem::DiskFile(fileName));\
00029     com::afrigis::util::logsystem::ChronicleLogger::getLogger().setLogFormatter( \
00030     new com::afrigis::util::logsystem::PlainText())
00031 
00032 //Set Log level
00033 #define _CLsetLevel(level) \
00034     com::afrigis::util::logsystem::ChronicleLogger::getLogger().setLevel(level)
00035 
00036 //Fatal: A very critical error which cause the application to terminate.
00037 #define _CLogFatal(logData)                                                     \
00038     do {                                                                        \
00039     namespace ChronicleLoggerName = com::afrigis::util::logsystem;              \
00040     if(ChronicleLoggerName::ChronicleLogger::getLogger().isEnableLevel(         \
00041                                             ChronicleLoggerName::FATAL)) {      \
00042         std::ostringstream __cLogost__;                                         \
00043         __cLogost__<<logData;                                                   \
00044         com::afrigis::util::logsystem::ChronicleLogger::getLogger().logFatal(   \
00045         __cLogost__.str(), __LINE__, __FUNCTION__, __FILE__);                   \
00046         }                                                                       \
00047     }while(0)
00048 
00049 //Critical: Application fall in to a serious error but it can still go forward
00050 #define _CLogCritical(logData)                                                  \
00051     do {                                                                        \
00052     namespace ChronicleLoggerName = com::afrigis::util::logsystem;              \
00053     if(ChronicleLoggerName::ChronicleLogger::getLogger().isEnableLevel(         \
00054                                             ChronicleLoggerName::CRITICAL)) {   \
00055         std::ostringstream __cLogost__;                                         \
00056         __cLogost__<<logData;                                                   \
00057         com::afrigis::util::logsystem::ChronicleLogger::getLogger().logCritical(\
00058         __cLogost__.str(), __LINE__, __FUNCTION__, __FILE__);                   \
00059         }                                                                       \
00060     }while(0)
00061 
00062 //Warning: Warning message for the user
00063 #define _CLogWarning(logData)                                                   \
00064     do {                                                                        \
00065     namespace ChronicleLoggerName = com::afrigis::util::logsystem;              \
00066     if(ChronicleLoggerName::ChronicleLogger::getLogger().isEnableLevel(         \
00067                                             ChronicleLoggerName::WARNING)) {    \
00068         std::ostringstream __cLogost__;                                         \
00069         __cLogost__<<logData;                                                   \
00070         com::afrigis::util::logsystem::ChronicleLogger::getLogger().logWarning( \
00071         __cLogost__.str(), __LINE__, __FUNCTION__, __FILE__);                   \
00072         }                                                                       \
00073     }while(0)
00074 
00075 //Info: Any information message.
00076 #define _CLogInfo(logData)                                                      \
00077     do {                                                                        \
00078     namespace ChronicleLoggerName = com::afrigis::util::logsystem;              \
00079     if(ChronicleLoggerName::ChronicleLogger::getLogger().isEnableLevel(         \
00080                                             ChronicleLoggerName::INFO)) {       \
00081         std::ostringstream __cLogost__;                                         \
00082         __cLogost__<<logData;                                                   \
00083         com::afrigis::util::logsystem::ChronicleLogger::getLogger().logInfo(    \
00084         __cLogost__.str(), __LINE__, __FUNCTION__, __FILE__);                   \
00085         }                                                                       \
00086     }while(0)
00087 
00088 //Debug: Log any kind of message that will help to debug the app
00089 #define _CLogDebug(logData)                                                     \
00090     do {                                                                        \
00091     namespace ChronicleLoggerName = com::afrigis::util::logsystem;              \
00092     if(ChronicleLoggerName::ChronicleLogger::getLogger().isEnableLevel(         \
00093                                             ChronicleLoggerName::DEBUG)) {      \
00094         std::ostringstream __cLogost__;                                         \
00095         __cLogost__<<logData;                                                   \
00096         com::afrigis::util::logsystem::ChronicleLogger::getLogger().logDebug(   \
00097         __cLogost__.str(), __LINE__, __FUNCTION__, __FILE__);                   \
00098         }                                                                       \
00099     }while(0)

00182

00196     
00206     void log (std::string message, int logLevel, int lineNo, std::string functionName, std::string fileName);
00207 
00216     void logFatal (std::string message, int lineNo, std::string functionName, std::string fileName);
00217

00227

00237
